title._content: "Senuelo," Edward Ditmars Wetmore house, 1050 Channel Drive, Montecito, California. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Senuelo," Edward Ditmars Wetmore house, 1050 Channel Drive, Montecito, California. Path to rose garden] [1917 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: U-shaped rancho style house built 1911 on land acquired from George Owen Knapp. Today: Not extant. Slide used with lecture "California Gardens" as no. 47. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16030 Call Number: LC-J717-X97- 31
